content:
I think I'll go with the Boll & Branch Soft Fleece Blanket and "When Breath Becomes Air" by Paul Kalanithi. Both of those sound like they could be really comforting. And I'll definitely consider including a gift certificate for a massage or spa treatment. That's a great idea.

Also, I was thinking about my ex-boyfriend's mom, who just passed away. I'm still trying to process that news, and it's been weighing on me. Do you think it would be okay to send a condolence gift or card to him, even though we haven't been in touch for years? Would that be awkward or inappropriate?
